skills.name: ALL HAIL
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies.
• Damage dealt increases the higher the enemy’s ATK stat.

skills.name: TOTAL WAR
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies.
• 45% Chance to Seal an ability of the enemy for 2 turns.

skills.name: WARMONGER
desc: Immune to Magic Damage. Grant Perfect Immunity to all allies for 1 turn at the start of battle and to self for the duration of battle. Grant Magic Penetration to all allies for 3 turns at the start of battle. Exhaust and drain 1 power from each enemy that is stunned at the start of your turn every turn.
